name: 楊凱翔
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的Fortran程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。 本課程將以C/C++教授物件、類別、控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、指標、字串、資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等課題（學校規定之專業必修課程）。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在工程上之應用。
schedule:
週次　　課程內容(　　教科書閱讀章節)
1　　計算機程式語言導論(第一章、第二章)
2　　程式語言設計實作（Visual C++操作介紹）(講義、第二章)
3　　物件導向程式設計簡介(第三章)
4　　程式流程控制(一)(第四章)
5　　程式流程控制(二)(第五章)
6　　函數(一)(第六章)
7　　函數(二)(第六章)
8　　陣列(第七章)
9　　期中考 + 陣列與運算(第七章)
10　　指標與字串(第八章)
11　　物件導向程式設計（一）(第九章)
12　　物件導向程式設計（二）(第九章)
13　　物件導向程式設計（三）(第十章)
14　　物件導向程式設計（四）(第十章)
15　　資料流與輸入輸出(第十五章)
16　　檔案處理(第十七章)
17　　資料結構(第二十一章)
18　　期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考 (midterm exam) 　　30%
期末考 (final exam)　　40%
作業   (homework)　　　　30%

*平時出席與課堂表現，作為期末考調整分數之依據。
materials:
1. Kernighan, B.W. and Ritchie, D.M. 1988. ”The C Programming Language.” 2nd Ed. Singapore: Prentice-Hall International Inc.
2. Etter, D.M. and Ingber, J.A. 2003. ”Engineering Problem Solving with C++” Upper Saddle River, NJ: Pearson Education, Inc.
3. Herbert, S. “C/C++ Programmer’s Reference” 3rd Ed. MeGraw-hill Companies, Inc.
4. 陳彰文等, “C++入門與實務應用”, 全華科技.
Web Resources:
1. http://www.progsource.com/index.html
The Programmer's Source is a great resource for information on many programming languages, including C++. You will find lists of tools, compilers, software, books and other C++ resources. 　
2. http://www.intranet.ca/~sshah/booklist.html#C++
The Programmer's Book List has a section for C++ books with 30+ titles.
3. http://www.genitor.com/resources.htm
The Developer Resources site has links to C++ compilers, useful C++ tools, source code from the C/C++ Users Journal and publications. 　
4. http://www.possibility.com/Cpp/CppCodingStandard.html
The C++ Coding Standard site has an extensive amount of information about the C++ programming language as well as a great list of C++ resources on the Web.　
5. http://help-site.com/cpp.html
Help-site.com provides links to C++ resources on the Web.
6. http://reality.sgi.com/austern/std-c++/faq.html
This is a FAQ site devoted to questions about the C++ ANSI/ISO standard, the design of the C++ programming language and the latest changes to the language.
7. http://pneuma.phys.ualberta.ca/~burris/
The Internet Link Exchange is another great resource for C++ information. This site has links to FAQs related to comp.lang.c++ and the C++ standard libraries.
